sourcesContent:
import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import defaultImage from './default.jpeg' import css from './Profile.module.css'; const Profile = ({ username, tag, location, avatar = defaultImage, stats, }) => { return (

{username}

{tag}

{location}

  • {stats.followers} 1000
  • {stats.views} 2000
  • {stats.likes} 3000
) } Profile.propTypes = { username: PropTypes.string, tag: PropTypes.string, location: PropTypes.string, avatar: PropTypes.string, stats: PropTypes.shape({ followers: PropTypes.number, views: PropTypes.number, likes: PropTypes.number, } ), } export default Profile
